pullRequest.title: Fix jstyle was invalid with default section at the start
pullRequest.bodyText:
Fixes #6303
Adapted the error message to give a hint what is probably missing.
I also noticed a problem in eclipse when executing the L10n test. It was missing an add-opens



 Change in CHANGELOG.md described (if applicable)
 Tests created for changes (if applicable)
 Manually tested changed features in running JabRef (always required)
 Screenshots added in PR description (for UI changes)
 Checked documentation: Is the information available and up to date? If not created an issue at https://github.com/JabRef/user-documentation/issues or, even better, submitted a pull request to the documentation repository.

commit.message:
Fix jstyle was invalid with default section at the start

Fixes #6303
Adapted the error message to give a hint what is probably missing.

I also noticed a problem in eclipse when executing the L10n test. It was missing an add-opens

nodes.bodyText: Is it possible to get more information (than a boolean) about why a style file is not valid? I guess the missing default may only be one of many reasons and so far the error message is not really helpful in diagnosing the problem.
